text: @funder “Vaccine or no vaccine” #POTUS made clear today America is reopening. Only 2 states meet WH guidelines to do so safely. If it doesn’t go well, he will deny that ever was his intention or plan! #Trump #TrumpHasNoPlan #COVID19 #Coronavirus #FoxNation #Hannity #Maddow #AC360 #BBC
